title: What is a Hitchhiker to the Future?
description: Introducing the Hitchhiker frame: who's crossed the threshold, why the old coordination infrastructure is breaking, and what we're building instead.

title: The Six Games Framework
description: The six games everyone's playing—and how to recognize which one you're in before you over-commit.

title: Why Networks Keep Failing Smart People
description: Maximum clarity, minimum coordination. Why the best networks reject the people who see the most—and what to do about it.
